dashboard.description:
**Helping to analyze troubles in *Skype for Business* by providing some aggregated information about the *Skype for Business* client's behavior during the last 24 hours.**
--- **Calls definitions:** * **Audio**: only has audio stream. * **Video**: has audio and video streams. If video is added to an ongoing audio call, it will be recognized as a video call. * **Screen sharing**: it consists in sharing the screen or an application window. --- **Calls statuses:** - **Successful**: established and ended without any problem. - **Failed**: could not be established or was not received by the destination, due to external problems (typically network issues). - **Dropped**: established correctly but due to external problems it was cancelled. - **Poor**: established correctly and has some quality issues. It may become dropped if not finished properly. - **Rejected**: cancelled by the caller or declined by the receiver before being established. NOT CONSIDERED IN THIS DASHBOARD.
